name: Sayu
storytext: By your side without a trace, like a character from a dream.
source: Reward for inviting Sayu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], and this character begins to $[K53]: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S15074]</color>.\nIf this usage of the skill triggers Swirl, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S15074]</color> is converted to DMG of the Swirled Element.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>, and this character begins to <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick</color>.\nIf this usage of the skill triggers Swirl, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick</color> is converted to DMG of the Swirled Element.
skills.description:
Deals 2 Anemo DMG, and this character begins to Prepare Skill: Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick.
If this usage of the skill triggers Swirl, then Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick is converted to DMG of the Swirled Element.

skills.name: Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry
skills.description: Deals 1 Anemo DMG, summons 1 Muji-Muji Daruma.

skills.name: Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick
skills.descriptionraw: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] (or the Swirled Element's DMG)
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color> (or the Swirled Element's DMG)
skills.description:
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 Anemo DMG (or the Swirled Element's DMG)
